image-caption: hands gesturing in workshop by Headway on unsplash
title: Library Workshops
paragraph: The library hosts workshops every week. Join us to learn about tools that impact your research or kick start your projects!

title: New Reference Hours
paragraph: Connect with a UI Librarian this semester 10am - 7pm Mon-Thu and 10am - 4pm Fri. Ask us, we're here to help!

title: Visit The MILL
paragraph: Join us for workshops every week at the library's Making, Innovating, and Learning Laboratory (MILL)

title: Featured Resource: Safari
paragraph: Access thousands of ebooks, videos, and courses in tech, business, communications, design, management, and more with Safari Books Online.

image-caption: Participants in the CDIL summer symposium 2017
title: Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning
paragraph: The only center of its kind in Idaho, CDIL provides digital scholarship research and learning opportunities on campus for faculty and students.

title: The Library Now Has Board Games!
paragraph: Need a study break? Take home one of the library's new board games! Find them on the first floor of the library by the magazines.

title: Featured Resource: The Vogue Archive
paragraph: Start your semester in style... browse more than 100 years of Vogue magazine online!

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Ph.D. Student Ross Miller (Physics '22) is one of the Library's ThinkOpen Fellows using Open Educational Resources (OER) to help save students money.

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.

title: Idaho Aerial Imagery Explorer
paragraph: A new interface to discover, explore, and download digital georeferenced aerial imagery for Idaho.

title: Think Open Fellowship applications are open!
paragraph: The application deadline for 2019 Think Open Fellowships has been extend to April 12th. Apply now for this great opportunity to make an impact on education affordability!

title: Women's History Month
paragraph: Celebrate Women's History Month by exploring our featured database resources

image-caption: food for fines, remixed icons from the noun project
title: Food for Fines!
paragraph: April 29th to May 10th donate to the Vandal Food Pantry at the Library's Info Desk to pay your fines.

image-caption: Photo by Trust Tru Katsande on Unsplash
title: Celebrate Poetry Month!
paragraph: April is National Poetry Month! Celebrate with Vandal Poem of the Day.

title: Happy Summer!
paragraph: The Library's summer hours are in effect from May 13 - August 25. If you're not at the beach, stop by, we'd love to see you!

image-caption: Young Men Diving into Lake during CCC Carnival
title: Dive in!
paragraph: Take time to explore our digital collections featuring historic content from SPEC.

title: Library Workshops!
paragraph: The library hosts workshops every week. Join us to learn about tools that impact your research or kick start your projects!

image-caption: I-tower frost from UI Media Photoshelter
title: Winter Intersession Hours
paragraph: Keep warm and enjoy the winter break! Check our hours page for opening times during the intersession.

title: New Curbside Delivery
paragraph: Miss physical library books? You can now request curbside pickup directly from our catalog!

image-caption: tools on wall by Barn Images
title: Workshop Videos & Slides
paragraph: Find videos, slides, and more from library workshops on our Resources page. Browse our content to learn something new or refresh your library skills!

title: Spring Semester Hours
paragraph: The Library is open to students, faculty, and staff. Check our Opening Guide for the latest details.

title: Library Statement on Racism
paragraph: The U of I Library Commits to Acting Against Racism.
